channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Brush Fire; INC#0662; 10:41AM; 3905 N Lake Vista Ct; MAP: https://bit.ly/43StQKF; Encino; Preliminary reports (limited visual) of approximately 1/4 acre of medium to heavy brush, slow moving and no structures threatened at this time. Additional resources added.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E109 E288 E290 E293 E73 E83 E84 E86 E88 EM17 H1 H2 H4 HA1 HA2 HA4 RA84 T88 T90 T93 WT88; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0094; 01:54AM; 436 S Boyle Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IrVZ3n; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: The first 38 firefighters on scene extinguished the fire in 27 minutes with no injuries reported. Updated size up: two story craftsman and a detached garage behind it were a previous burn, fully involved and it extended to an additional detached garage to the rear. No further details. ; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC14 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E17 E2 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E25 E289 E89 E9 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA2 SQ21 T10 T11 T2 T3 T89 T9 UR88 UR89; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0094; 01:27AM; 446 S Boyle Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Kuj06G; Boyle Heights; Large lot with multiple structures and there is a single family dwelling (previous burn) well involved with exposures. Firefighters are in the defensive mode against the main building and are focusing on defending the exposures. Two additional task forces requested. ; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E2 E202 E25 RA2 SQ21 T2; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle (Tree on Vehicle); INC#1369; 06:55PM; 4849 N Huntington Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/47drmcV; El Sereno; Large branch from an even larger tree fell onto two vehicles with one patient trapped inside vehicle. The patient is stable (age/gender unknown). It will likely be an extended operation to stabilize and then safely remove the tree to extricate the patient. Traffic will be affected and commuters are advised to seek one of the many alternate routes. No further details. LAPD Inc# 3553; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E1 E16 E201 E47 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA1 RA47 T1; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Train vs Ped; INC#1311; 06:13PM; 2555 E Olympic Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uEjYWZ; Boyle Heights; Metrolink train versus pedestrian (reported as 'clipped pedestrian'). Approximately 55yo female patient transported in critical condition. All media questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 3361 for the investigation. No further details.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E17 E2 E202 E25 EM11 HR3 RA56 RA9 T2; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1205; 05:39PM; 4026 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OJgqwg; West Adams; KNOCKDOWN: 40 firefighters extinguished the fire in 23 minutes with no injuries reported. Fire was on the 1st and 2nd floors but prevented from extending into the attic. No other structures were damaged. No further details.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 E226 E26 E294 E34 E68 E94 RA68 RA894 RA94 T26 T94; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1205; 05:16PM; 4026 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OJgqwg; West Adams; 2 story four-plex (vacant) with heavy smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. One additional task force requested. ; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E226 E26 E294 E34 E68 E94 RA894 RA94 T26 T94; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0990; 03:05PM; 566 S San Pedro St; MAP: https://bit.ly/38WmPPa; Downtown; Firefighters located a fire outside on a 2nd floor balcony. They quickly extinguished the fire and are clearing out the light smoke in the hallway. Occupants on the 2nd floor are evacuated with no injuries reported.. Most resources will be going available. No further details.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E17 E202 E203 E209 E211 E3 E4 E9 EM1 HR3 RA4 RA803 SQ21 T11 T2 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0990; 02:56PM; 566 S San Pedro St; MAP: https://bit.ly/38WmPPa; Downtown; 12 story E-shaped pre-1960 building with smoke showing from the 2nd floor. Two additional task forces requested. Firefighters are investigating source of the smoke.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E209 E4 E9 RA4 SQ21 T9; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Grass; INC#0721; 12:53PM; Eb 10 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FyBY7t; Jefferson Park; KNOCKDOWN: 32 firefighters fully contained and extinguished the fire in 37 mins with no injuries reported. Firefighters prevented the fire from extending to the exposed homes (2). Freeway traffic will likely remain impacted until the mop up is complete. Please refer to CHP Traffic (cad.chp.ca.gov) for updates. No further details.; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 E226 E229 E26 E34 E61 T26 T29; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart
